title: Easy Salmon Pasta Salad
directions: First whisk together your fresh lemon juice, chopped ginger, grated lemon peel and olive oil together in a large sized mixing bowl. Whisk until thoroughly blended.
Next add in your remaining ingredients and toss vigorously until well blended.
Make sure that you add enough of your roasted pepper juices to ensure that your salad is nice and moist. You do not want your salad to be dry.
Season with a dash of salt and pepper for taste and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 ½ Tbsp. of Lemon Peel Finely Grated
● 1 ¼ Pound of Salmon Wild Caught Variety
● 1 ½ Tbsp. of Ginger Peeled and Finely Chopped
● 2 ½ Tbsp. of Lemon Juice Fresh
● 1 ½ Tbsp. of Chives Finely Chopped
